Package View

Class TaxerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.Printer
      • View.Printable
        • View.TaxerView
  • public class TaxerView
extends Printable
    This method is view of the taxer(Business class). Inherit Printable because use tools of printer and this class need to title.
